The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 08 October is 480,656 (853.9 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 04 October, there were 69,182 new confirmed cases (122.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 27 September, there were 39,873 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 74% (29309 extra cases).
